overview:
Martin directs the Worldwide Sales Team at fast growing Bango, the global leader making it easy to do business on the mobile web. Bango provides simple access, information and payment solutions to companies selling digital content on the mobile web.

He is a seasoned sales management professional with many successful years selling IT solutions to the corporate world. Extensive sales experience at Sun Microsystems, iii, NCR and Torch Computer Corporation.

Specialties include: Sales Management, Mobile Content, Sales negotiation, Sales strategy and implementation, Payforit, Mobile Web.
